column1: Little Goat Diner////Came here with my parents and boyfriend on Sunday
column2: after the Hot Chocolate 5k. As to be expected for a party of four near 11 a.m.
column3: we were quoted a two hour wait. Luckily we were seated after forty minutes. Food and service were both great
column4: I ordered the Parathas Burrito while my boyfriend ordered the Everything is Everything Crumpets. Both were great without being overwhelmingly heavy
column5: although I couldn't finish my order.
